allow: Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -p 8288 root@117.53.155.172 "pkill -f ''next-server'' || true; sleep 2; ss -tlnp | grep 3000")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -p 8288 root@117.53.155.172 "pkill -9 -f next-server; pkill -9 -f ''npm start''; sleep 2; ss -tlnp | grep 3000 || echo ''Port 3000 is now free''")
Bash(ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ServerAliveInterval=30 -p 8288 root@117.53.155.172 "pkill -9 -f next; sleep 1; ss -tlnp | grep 3000")
